name: Lonely warrior
description:
This my first Game Jam and my first finished Game. Sorry for not having sound but I didn't had enough time to learn how to implement it. I hope you will love the story. The game is also in french because I speak in french.

I don't know why but if your screen resolution is not 1280/720 you will have a lot of fps loss when playing in full screen, but you can still play without fullscreen enabled.

Have a good day

Edit: this may work on Linux and mac but i'm not sure
